short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyze Reddit post comments to quickly find the top 10 most popular ones and see the word frequency breakdown.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you want to know what the highlights of reddit hundreds of or thousands of comments, you can use this extension to quickly analyze the comments and let you know the 10 highest vote comments and 20 most mentioned bigram.
